Articles.Content:
I recently took one of my space planes to orbit and for a skip around Kerbin. In that time I had an unrealistic thought of how it would be to fly through an asteroid field old school game style and this popped in my head. Would be fun though!

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/asteroid-fields-ahead

It's not my norm, so of course I like it more

Let me know what you think!
